name: 🥚⌛🍳 TIME OMELETTE 🍳⌛🥚
description:
🥚⌛🍳 TIME OMELETTE 🍳⌛🥚

A mystery by @OxyOxspring & adrielbeaver
Additional writing by @dwarph & @bonaneh

Since the beginning of recorded time, the New Year's Baby has been hatched from its protective egg at precisely midnight on New Year's Eve. In a shock move, someone at the facility has stolen the 2017 egg just moments before the hatching ceremony begins.

You have been summoned to the scene of the crime in order to track down the culprit and rescue the egg before it is too late!
